Container.Name: jellyfin-discord-bot
Container.Overview:
A simple and leightweight Discord Bot, that integrates with your Jellyfin Media server and enables you to listen to your favourite music directly from discord. Supports Discord commands and easy configuration with environment variables.
To set up your own instance, please follow the guide: https://github.com/manuel-rw/jellyfin-discord-music-bot/wiki
Container.DonateText: Like this template? Please consider to donate:

Config.Name: DISCORD_CLIENT_TOKEN
Config.Description: The bot secret token, that can be obtained from the Discord developer portal. Use the guide for exact instructions.

Config.Name: JELLYFIN_SERVER_ADDRESS
Config.Description: The Jellyfin server to connect to. Do not end with

Config.Name: JELLYFIN_AUTHENTICATION_USERNAME
Config.Description: The username to use to connect to Jellyfin

Config.Name: JELLYFIN_AUTHENTICATION_PASSWORD
Config.Description: The password to use to connect to Jellyfin

Config.Name: LOG_LEVEL
Config.Description: Overrides the default log level. Defaults to LOG. Can be set to DEBUG to search for problems.

Config.Name: ALLOW_EVERYONE_FOR_DEFAULT_PERMS
Config.Description: Allow everyone to control the bot by default for new servers and users

Config.Name: UPDATER_DISABLE_NOTIFICATIONS
Config.Description: By default, update notifications will be sent to the Discord server owner. If you do not like this, you can disable these notifications.
